issue.title: [Release][Website] After 0.14 release, update what is an "official" release
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5444](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5444). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4411#discussion_r288846129>. C++ and GLib (C) Packages for Debian GNU/Linux, Ubuntu and CentOS should be "official". And maybe we can make some of the others official too?

comments.body:

This appears to have been done already.
